translation.en: We had evidence on top of buildings, on windowsills, on top of cars.
translation.it: C'erano prove sugli edifici, sui davanzali, sulle auto.

translation.en: It was a huge crime scene, and it was trampled and kicked everywhere.
translation.it: Era un'enorme scena del crimine e veniva calpestata ovunque.

translation.en: We're finding BBs, shrapnel.
translation.it: Trovammo pallini, schegge.

translation.en: The type of shrapnel they saw could not have just been debris lying around,
translation.it: Queste schegge non possono essere detriti sparsi in giro,

translation.en: but rather they were, in fact, carpenter nails and BB-like objects.
translation.it: ma sono chiodi da falegname e oggetti simili a pallini.

translation.en: What they are looking at is how this bomb was put together.
translation.it: Stanno cercando di capire come sia stata assemblata questa bomba.

translation.en: What are the materials used? What was the fuse? What was the detonator?
translation.it: Quali sono i materiali usati? Qual era la miccia? E il detonatore?

translation.en: [Swindon] There were shredded backpacks, as opposed to a backpack that was hit.
translation.it: C'erano zaini a brandelli, diversi da uno zaino colpito.

translation.en: These were backpacks that we believed held the bombs.
translation.it: Pensavamo che avessero contenuto le bombe.

translation.en: The bomb experts are immediately going, "This is a remote-controlled device."
translation.it: Gli artificieri dissero subito che si trattava di un ordigno telecomandato.

translation.en: [DesLauriers] As we collected the evidence,
translation.it: Raccogliendo le prove,

translation.en: we began to put together the puzzle of these bombs.
translation.it: iniziammo a ricostruire il puzzle delle bombe.

translation.en: The first bomb went off near the finish line.
translation.it: La prima bomba esplose vicino al traguardo.

translation.en: The second bomb went off about 12 seconds later in front of a restaurant called The Forum restaurant.
translation.it: La seconda esplose circa 12 secondi dopo davanti a un ristorante, il Forum.

translation.en: Our theory was
translation.it: La nostra teoria

translation.en: that the bombs were transported to the bombing sites in backpacks,
translation.it: era che le bombe fossero state portate lì negli zaini,

translation.en: and these were likely pressure cooker bombs with metal fragments inside of them.
translation.it: bombe fatte con pentole a pressione contenenti frammenti metallici.

translation.en: Pressure cooker bombs are popular terrorist weapons
translation.it: Queste bombe sono popolari armi terroristiche

translation.en: because the parts can be bought at different stores.
translation.it: perché le parti sono acquistabili in diversi negozi.

translation.en: The lid to the pressure cooker used in Monday's bombing
translation.it: Il coperchio della pentola a pressione usata lunedì

translation.en: has been found on a nearby rooftop.
translation.it: è stato trovato su un tetto lì vicino.

translation.en: [Guthrie] Does this strike you as bearing the hallmarks of some kind of domestic terrorism?
translation.it: Le sembra che presentino tratti distintivi di terrorismo interno?

translation.en: This is a terrorism investigation. It's a terrorism case.
translation.it: È un'indagine per terrorismo. È un caso di terrorismo.

translation.en: And whether the politicians are worried about, "It sounds bad. We don't want to say that."
translation.it: I politici sono preoccupati e non vogliono dirlo perché sembra brutto.

translation.en: That's fine, but make no mistake about it, this is a terrorism investigation.
translation.it: Va bene, ma non vi confondete, questa è un'indagine per terrorismo.

translation.en: That's why the FBI is running it.
translation.it: È per questo che la segue l'FBI.

translation.en: Terrorism is an attack that's motivated by an ideology.
translation.it: Il terrorismo è un attacco motivato da un'ideologia.

translation.en: In the Boston Marathon bombings, we didn't know what it was.
translation.it: Negli attentati di Boston, non sapevamo cosa fosse.

translation.en: But at that time, no matter who was responsible,
translation.it: Ma, chiunque fosse stato il responsabile,

translation.en: we had found the backpacks, we found the pressure cooker bombs.
translation.it: avevamo trovato gli zaini, le bombe

translation.en: We found pieces of metal that were inside the pressure cooker bombs.
translation.it: e i pezzi di metallo che erano dentro le bombe.

translation.en: These were clearly designed to maim and kill people.
translation.it: L'intenzione era mutilare e uccidere la gente.

translation.en: So we were comfortable telling the American public that we suspected this was a terrorist attack.
translation.it: Quindi potemmo dire agli americani che pensavamo fosse un atto terroristico.

translation.en: Good morning, everybody.
translation.it: Buongiorno a tutti.

translation.en: I've just been briefed by my National Security team,
translation.it: Il mio team della Sicurezza Nazionale, tra cui il direttore dell'FBI,

translation.en: including FBI Director Mueller, on the attacks in Boston.
translation.it: Il mio team della Sicurezza Nazionale, tra cui il direttore dell'FBI, mi ha aggiornato sugli attacchi di Boston.

translation.en: And given what we now know about what took place,
translation.it: E in base a ciò che ora sappiamo sull'accaduto,

translation.en: the FBI is investigating it as an act of terrorism.
translation.it: l'FBI sta indagando su un atto di terrorismo.

translation.en: Anytime bombs are used to target innocent civilians,
translation.it: Quando le bombe vengono usate per colpire civili innocenti,

translation.en: it is an act of terror.
translation.it: è un atto di terrore.

translation.en: We still do not know who did this or why,
translation.it: Non sappiamo ancora chi sia stato o perché,

translation.en: and people shouldn't jump to conclusions before we have all the facts.
translation.it: e non bisogna saltare alle conclusioni prima di sapere tutto.

translation.en: But make no mistake, we will get to the bottom of this,
translation.it: Ma non abbiate alcun dubbio, andremo a fondo della cosa,

translation.en: and we will find out who did this. We'll find out why they did this.
translation.it: e scopriremo chi è stato e perché l'ha fatto.

translation.en: 9/11 was a turning point, I think, for all of us.
translation.it: L'11 settembre è stato un punto di svolta per tutti noi.

translation.en: But particularly for Muslims.
translation.it: Ma soprattutto per i musulmani.

translation.en: We were shocked to see what had happened.
translation.it: Fummo scioccati da ciò che accadde.

translation.en: But there was definitely a change.
translation.it: Ma ci fu decisamente un cambiamento.

translation.en: Certainly to feel as if, all of a sudden, we were the perpetrators.
translation.it: Ci sentimmo improvvisamente come se i colpevoli fossimo stati noi.

translation.en: It was a difficult time for us.
translation.it: È stato difficile per noi.

translation.en: The essence of Islam is about being a good human being.
translation.it: L'essenza dell'Islam è essere un buon essere umano.

translation.en: We are here as Americans. We are here as part of society.
translation.it: Siamo qui come americani. Siamo qui come parte della società.

translation.en: But when you don't know about something,
translation.it: Ma quando non conosciamo qualcosa,

translation.en: your very first reaction is to fear it.
translation.it: come prima reazione ne abbiamo paura.

translation.en: And that's exactly what had happened with Muslims.
translation.it: Ed è questo che accadde con i musulmani.

translation.en: [chanting] Go home! Go home! Go home!
translation.it: NON DIMENTICHIAMO MAI

translation.en: [woman 1] Go home!
translation.it: Tornate a casa!

translation.en: -[woman 2] Get out here! -[woman 1] Go back home!
translation.it: Fuori di qui! Tornate a casa!

translation.en: In a post 9/11 era, the bullying was vicious.
translation.it: Nell'era post 11 settembre, il bullismo era feroce.

translation.en: It was consistent. It was every day.
translation.it: Era continuo. Ogni giorno.

translation.en: And I was constantly hiding certain aspects of myself,
translation.it: Nascondevo costantemente alcuni aspetti di me stesso,

translation.en: like, whenever I… navigated life, really.
translation.it: ogni volta che… vivevo la mia vita.

translation.en: I moved to Boston when I was seven years old.
translation.it: Mi trasferii a Boston a sette anni.

translation.en: Two weeks before 9/11.
translation.it: Due settimane prima dell'11 settembre.

translation.en: The kids used to come up to me with fake bombs
translation.it: I bambini venivano da me con bombe finte,

translation.en: and then run away and then make, like, ticking noises.
translation.it: poi scappavano imitando il ticchettio.

translation.en: So, I had a lot of shame being a Muslim.
translation.it: Mi vergognavo molto di essere musulmano.

translation.en: When the bombing happened, I was in college.
translation.it: Quando ci fu l'attentato, ero al college.

translation.en: I remember thinking, "Please don't let it have anything to do with Islam."
translation.it: Pensai: "Ti prego, fa' che non c'entri con l'Islam".

translation.en: You couldn't help that sinking feeling inside you
translation.it: Non potevo evitare di sentire dentro di me

translation.en: uh, to think that maybe this is committed by somebody
translation.it: che forse era stato commesso

translation.en: who is a Muslim.
translation.it: da un musulmano.

translation.en: [Youssef] Islamophobia was just starting to go away.
translation.it: L'islamofobia stava appena iniziando a svanire.

translation.en: I immediately knew that they were going to pin it on Islam.
translation.it: Capii subito che lo avrebbero collegato all'Islam.

translation.en: [DesLauriers] Once we determined that it was a terrorist event,
translation.it: Una volta stabilito che si trattava di terrorismo,

translation.en: the full weight and force of the federal government was looking for these bombers.
translation.it: tutte le forze federali si misero a cercare gli attentatori.

translation.en: We knew where the bombings took place. We knew there were businesses located along Boylston Street
translation.it: Conoscevamo i luoghi delle esplosioni. C'erano negozi lungo Boylston Street

translation.en: that had CCTV cameras located on the front of them.
translation.it: con telecamere a circuito chiuso.

translation.en: So we knew that if we looked at it,
translation.it: Sapevamo che, guardando i filmati,

translation.en: we would likely find visual images of the bombers.
translation.it: probabilmente avremmo trovato immagini degli attentatori.

translation.en: The first significant piece of evidence was the video coverage from The Forum.
translation.it: La prima prova significativa fu il filmato del Forum.

translation.en: They had an outdoor camera that was positioned above a door,
translation.it: Aveva una telecamera esterna posizionata sopra una porta,

translation.en: which actually had a vantage point out to where the second explosion went off.
translation.it: da dove si vedeva bene il punto della seconda esplosione.

translation.en: And we started processing that very quickly
translation.it: Iniziammo a elaborarlo subito

translation.en: because we knew that that could contain some significant evidence for us.
translation.it: perché sapevamo che poteva contenere delle prove importanti.

translation.en: We had analysts watching this video repeatedly over and over and over again.
translation.it: Gli analisti guardarono questo video più e più volte.

translation.en: Rewinding, playing it again, rewinding.
translation.it: Riavvolgi, riproduci, riavvolgi.

translation.en: Enhancing.
translation.it: Migliora.

translation.en: All night long, frame by frame.
translation.it: Tutta la notte, con scrupolo.

translation.en: There was nothing remarkable about the video at all.
translation.it: Non c'era niente di particolare nel video.

translation.en: But we got a phone call from a member of the public who said,
translation.it: Ma ricevemmo una telefonata da un passante

translation.en: "I was across the street, and I have a couple of still shots that you may want."
translation.it: che disse: "Ero dall'altra parte della strada, ho delle foto per voi.

translation.en: "These still shots were taken right before the explosion went off."
translation.it: Le ho scattate subito prima dell'esplosione".

translation.en: We had our evidence collection team seize those photos,
translation.it: Prendemmo le foto,

translation.en: and the still shot showed a bag on the ground.
translation.it: e si vedeva una borsa per terra.

translation.en: We time synced that still shot up with the moving video from The Forum,
translation.it: Sincronizzammo la foto con il video del Forum

translation.en: and that showed this person who was a little taller than everybody else
translation.it: e individuammo una persona che era più alta di tutte le altre,

translation.en: and had a white hat on.
translation.it: con un cappello bianco.

translation.en: I immediately called Rick and I said,
translation.it: Chiamai immediatamente Rick

translation.en: "Rick, you really have to come up to the lab to see this."
translation.it: e gli dissi di venire al laboratorio.

translation.en: Kevin Swindon gave me a call, he said, "Boss, I want to show you a video."
translation.it: Kevin Swindon mi chiamò e disse: "Capo, vieni a vedere".

translation.en: You see this individual with a white hat walking forward toward the bomb site,
translation.it: C'è un tizio col cappello bianco che va verso il luogo dell'attentato

translation.en: and he stops right by a tree in front of The Forum restaurant.
translation.it: e si ferma vicino a un albero davanti al Forum.

translation.en: And he stands there looking around like anybody else.
translation.it: Si guarda intorno come tutti quanti.

translation.en: Then you see him drop the backpack to the ground and he stands there.
translation.it: Poi getta uno zaino a terra e rimane lì.

translation.en: [Swindon] Looks like he's taking pictures of people running. He's texting.
translation.it: Sembra che fotografi i corridori e che messaggi.

translation.en: And then you see the concussive effects of the first bomb going off.
translation.it: E poi si vedono gli effetti della prima bomba.

translation.en: Everybody on the camera looks to the left, and then he just quickly walks to the right.
translation.it: Tutti guardano a sinistra e lui cammina velocemente verso destra.

translation.en: [woman] Oh my God! Something blew up. Something blew up. Oh my God, something happened.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio! Qualcosa è esploso. Oddio, è successo qualcosa.

translation.en: And as soon as he leaves the field of view of the camera,
translation.it: E non appena esce dal campo visivo,

translation.en: the second bomb goes off right in front of The Forum restaurant.
translation.it: la seconda bomba esplode proprio davanti al Forum.

translation.en: At that point, we knew we had the video of one of the bombers.
translation.it: In quel momento, sapemmo di avere il video di uno degli attentatori.

translation.en: We called him White Hat.
translation.it: Cappello bianco.

translation.en: [Martin] Wednesday is almost like this blackout day because you're not hearing anything,
translation.it: Il mercoledì fu un giorno morto, perché non ci furono novità.

translation.en: and then suddenly a press conference that was supposed to begin is canceled.
translation.it: Ma poi una conferenza stampa che stava per iniziare fu cancellata.

translation.en: We are having a press conference. But now we need more time to prepare. Thank you very much.
translation.it: Terremo una conferenza stampa, ma ci serve più tempo per prepararci. Grazie mille.

translation.en: -[reporter] What time is it? -I don't know what time.
translation.it: - A che ora sarà? - Non lo so.

translation.en: We made a decision to not have a press conference
translation.it: Decidemmo di annullarla

translation.en: because we had discovered the video evidence at that time, and we had to focus on that first.
translation.it: perché avevamo trovato le prove video e dovevamo concentrarci prima su quelle.

translation.en: But I think that that led to some media speculation as to what might be going on.
translation.it: Ma credo che ciò abbia spinto i media a speculare su ciò che stava accadendo.

translation.en: The police were trying to keep a tight lid on information.
translation.it: La polizia cercava di tenere sotto silenzio le informazioni.

translation.en: You saw the void being filled on social media.
translation.it: Il vuoto venne riempito sui social.

translation.en: Folks were looking at photos saying, "What do you know about this person?"
translation.it: La gente vedeva foto che dicevano: "Cosa sai di questa persona?"

translation.en: The problem with asking that question, though, of course, it is accusatory.
translation.it: Il problema di questa domanda è che è accusatoria.

translation.en: Folks were being pointed at,
translation.it: La gente veniva additata

translation.en: and the Boston police were getting a lot of false leads.
translation.it: e la polizia di Boston riceveva molte false piste.

translation.en: Somebody posted a picture of a shadowy figure
translation.it: Qualcuno postò la foto di una figura

translation.en: walking on the rooftop.
translation.it: che camminava sul tetto.

translation.en: It looked like one of these Sasquatch pictures.
translation.it: Sembrava una di quelle foto di Sasquatch.

translation.en: And then we receive a picture of a little bag on the racecourse
translation.it: Poi arrivò una foto di una piccola borsa sul percorso

translation.en: where the explosion happened.
translation.it: nel punto dell'esplosione.

translation.en: And then the bureau did an analysis on it and they said, "No, this was Photoshop."
translation.it: L'FBI l'analizzò e disse che era stato usato Photoshop.

translation.en: That takes investigative resources away from chasing the bad guys.
translation.it: Questo distoglie le risorse investigative dalla caccia ai cattivi.

translation.en: But that stuff was appearing online.
translation.it: Ma quella roba appariva online.

translation.en: [Martin] People were sitting in their living rooms, playing detective on social media.
translation.it: La gente giocava ai detective sui social dal salotto di casa.

translation.en: It also became an opportunity for bigots
translation.it: Fu anche un'occasione per i fanatici

translation.en: to bask in their assumptions and to propagate those further.
translation.it: per bearsi nelle loro credenze e diffonderle.

translation.en: People would say this is clearly the work of Islamic terrorists.
translation.it: Dicevano che fosse opera di terroristi islamici.

translation.en: And it didn't help that right-wing figures were echoing this.
translation.it: E non aiutava che personaggi di destra facessero da cassa di risonanza.

translation.en: Most terrorists, lately at least, have been Muslim.
translation.it: La maggior parte dei terroristi, almeno ultimamente, sono musulmani.

translation.en: They were resparking the flames of Islamophobia throughout the nation.
translation.it: Stavano riaccendendo la fiamma dell'islamofobia in tutta la nazione.

translation.en: The news media outlets were not helping.
translation.it: I media non furono d'aiuto.

translation.en: Our sources on this story have encouraged us to look deeply
translation.it: Le nostre fonti ci hanno incoraggiato a un approfondimento

translation.en: into who this Saudi national is.
translation.it: su chi sia questo cittadino saudita.

translation.en: [Martin] Even after he was cleared, the media was hounding
translation.it: Anche dopo che fu scagionato, i media perseguitarono il saudita e persino il suo coinquilino.

translation.en: the Saudi Arabian national and even his roommate.
translation.it: i media perseguitarono il saudita e persino il suo coinquilino.

translation.en: [reporter] Do you know anything about these bombings?
translation.it: Sai qualcosa degli attentati?

translation.en: Do you have anything to do with them? The police came to your apartment.
translation.it: C'entri qualcosa? Perché la polizia è venuta a casa tua.

translation.en: And then they said someone had been brought down to the federal courthouse.
translation.it: Poi dissero che qualcuno era stato portato al tribunale federale.

translation.en: There are various media reports that an arrest has been made.
translation.it: Secondo vari media, c'è stato un arresto.

translation.en: And now there are hundreds of people outside the federal courthouse.
translation.it: In centinaia si radunarono fuori dal tribunale.

translation.en: Reporters are everywhere. It's like chaos.
translation.it: I giornalisti erano ovunque. C'era il caos.

translation.en: I remember saying, "Ed, is this guy in custody?"
translation.it: Ricordo di aver chiesto: "È in custodia?"

translation.en: He said, "No, no, I didn't hear."
translation.it: Dissero: "No, non ho sentito".

translation.en: There was a lot of misinformation. A lot of clamoring to be breaking news.
translation.it: C'era molta disinformazione. Troppo clamore per essere un'ultima ora.

translation.en: [Ortiz] The next thing I know,
translation.it: Poi seppi

translation.en: there's potentially a bomb or some explosive in the area.
translation.it: che poteva esserci una bomba o dell'esplosivo nell'area.

translation.en: [reporter] After all that commotion, we were given the all clear,
translation.it: Dopo tutto il trambusto, ci hanno dato il via libera,

translation.en: and employees were allowed to go inside, get their belongings,
translation.it: i dipendenti sono rientrati a prendere le loro cose

translation.en: and then court was closed down for the day.
translation.it: e il tribunale per oggi ha chiuso.

translation.en: Authorities stress there is no suspect in custody.
translation.it: Le autorità sottolineano che non ci sono sospetti n custodia.

translation.en: [Evans] There was a lot of misinformation out there being generated.
translation.it: Veniva generata molta disinformazione.

translation.en: We had to stay focused on what was real and what wasn't real.
translation.it: Dovevamo concentrarci su ciò che era reale e ciò che non lo era.

translation.en: [DesLauriers] At that point, we knew we had visually identified one of the bombers.
translation.it: A quel punto, avevamo identificato visivamente uno degli attentatori.

translation.en: The next priority was gathering more video evidence from along Boylston Street.
translation.it: Ora ci servivano altre prove video prese a Boylston Street.

translation.en: Because we wanted to determine if there were any other leads
translation.it: Volevamo capire se ci fossero indizi

translation.en: that could help us identify this individual.
translation.it: per identificare questo individuo.

translation.en: The next critical piece of evidence we gained access to
translation.it: La seguente prova valida che ottenemmo

translation.en: was a video from a business that was on the corner of Boylston Street, named Whiskey's.
translation.it: fu il video di un bar che si trovava all'angolo di Boylston Street, Whiskey's.

translation.en: From the video, we were able to time sync it
translation.it: Riuscimmo a sincronizzare il video per identificare Cappello bianco

translation.en: to identify White Hat walking around the corner.
translation.it: Riuscimmo a sincronizzare il video per identificare Cappello bianco che girava l'angolo.

translation.en: But we realized there was more to the video.
translation.it: Ma capimmo che c'era dell'altro.

translation.en: He was accompanied by another gentleman with a black hat and a backpack,
translation.it: Con lui c'era un uomo con un cappello nero e uno zaino,

translation.en: and they were together.
translation.it: ed erano insieme.

translation.en: [Foley] That became its own investigation.
translation.it: L'indagine si restrinse.

translation.en: We've got them here.
translation.it: Li avevamo qui.

translation.en: How can we follow them backwards in time through video footage?
translation.it: Come fare per seguirli a ritroso nel tempo con i video?

translation.en: [Swindon] We were able to build a timeline in between those two locations
translation.it: Riuscimmo a creare una linea temporale tra questi due punti

translation.en: from the different digital video recorders.
translation.it: grazie a varie registrazioni.

translation.en: And then sort of trace their steps,
translation.it: E seguimmo i loro passi

translation.en: turning the corner at Whiskey's and walking towards The Forum.
translation.it: dall'angolo del Whiskey's fino al Forum.

translation.en: It became evident to us that these two were hiding in plain sight.
translation.it: Per passare inosservati non si nascondevano affatto.

translation.en: [DesLauriers] These individuals did not have hoods.
translation.it: Non usavano cappucci, non nascondevano il volto.

translation.en: They weren't obscuring their faces. They could be visually recognized.
translation.it: Non usavano cappucci, non nascondevano il volto. Erano riconoscibili visivamente.

translation.en: These were two young, Caucasian males.
translation.it: Erano due giovani maschi caucasici.

translation.en: They had hats on, sunglasses.
translation.it: Indossavano cappelli e occhiali da sole.

translation.en: Problem is, is that we didn't know who they were.
translation.it: Ma non sapevamo chi fossero.

translation.en: At the time, facial recognition software was good if you had a three-inch-by-three-inch clear face shot.
translation.it: Il riconoscimento facciale funzionava solo con un primo piano chiaro di 10x10 cm.

translation.en: We just didn't have that type of clarity. They were grainy.
translation.it: Non avevamo foto così chiare. Erano sgranate.

translation.en: They were sometimes taken at a distance.
translation.it: A volte erano ripresi a distanza.

translation.en: We didn't know who they were, we didn't know what their motivations for doing the bombings were,
translation.it: Non sapevamo chi fossero o quali fossero le loro motivazioni,

translation.en: but we had the bombers in sight.
translation.it: ma avevamo gli attentatori nel mirino.

translation.en: [Davis] I get a phone call from Rick DesLauriers,
translation.it: Rick DesLauriers mi telefonò

translation.en: and I get over there as quickly as possible.
translation.it: e mi precipitai di corsa.

translation.en: Carmen Ortiz was there, and they cued up the video.
translation.it: Carmen Ortiz era lì e mi mostrarono il video.

translation.en: And I got my eyes on these guys for the first time.
translation.it: Vidi quei due per la prima volta.

translation.en: They kept playing it over and over again.
translation.it: Lo rivedemmo più e più volte.

translation.en: When I saw that video, I said, "We have them." "These are the guys."
translation.it: Quando vidi quel filmato, dissi: "Eccoli. Sono loro".

translation.en: [Davis] It was striking to me how innocent they looked.
translation.it: Mi colpì il loro aspetto innocente.

translation.en: Backpack over his shoulder, he was walking down the street, looking like any other college kid.
translation.it: Zaino in spalla, passeggiavano come qualsiasi altro studente.

translation.en: [Ortiz] But we didn't know
translation.it: Ma non sapevamo

translation.en: who they were,
translation.it: chi fossero,
